content.query:
USE [Doordash]
GO

CREATE OR ALTER VIEW [Restaurant]
 AS
 SELECT
    [customStoreId] AS [RestaurantId],
    [Submarket],
    [District],
    CAST([lastUpdatedOn] AS DATETIMEOFFSET) AS [UpdatedOn],
    [loggingStoreName] AS [Name],
    [Description],
    [customRatingAverageRating] AS [AverageRating],
    [loggingNumStarRating] AS [RatingCount],
    [priceRangeDisplayString] AS [PriceRange],
    [coverSquareImageUrl] AS [ImageUrl],
    [BusinessTags],
    [Locations],
    JSON_QUERY([menuLogs], '$[0].menuItems') AS [MenuLogs]
 FROM OPENROWSET(â€‹PROVIDER = 'CosmosDB',
                CONNECTION = 'Account=cosmos-keepapp;Database=doordash',
                OBJECT = 'restaurants',
                SERVER_CREDENTIAL = 'cosmos-keepapp'
)
WITH (
    [lastUpdatedOn] NVARCHAR(MAX),
    [submarket] NVARCHAR(255),
    [district] NVARCHAR(255),
    [customRatingAverageRating] FLOAT,
    [customStoreId] BIGINT,
    [loggingNumStarRating] BIGINT,
    [loggingStoreName] NVARCHAR(255),
    [description] NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.restaurantDetail.description',
    [businessTags] VARCHAR(MAX) '$.restaurantDetail.businessTags',
    [priceRangeDisplayString] NVARCHAR(255) '$.restaurantDetail.priceRangeDisplayString',
    [coverSquareImageUrl] NVARCHAR(255) '$.restaurantDetail.coverSquareImageUrl',
    [menuLogs] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [locations] VARCHAR(MAX)
) AS [MenuChange]
GO
